languages.text: {n}Гордые имперцы один за другим опускаются на колени. На лицах одних написан страх. На других — свирепая решимость. На третьих — спокойное принятие. Ни один из бойцов сопротивления не оказался трусом, что предпочел бы жизнь среди ксеносов смерти во имя Императора.{/n}

{n}One by one, the proud people of the Imperium drop to their knees. Some of the faces show fear. Some display grim determination. Some bear expressions of serene acceptance. There are no cowards among the resistance fighters — none who would choose life among the xenos to death in the name of the Emperor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Гордые имперцы один за другим опускаются на колени. На лицах одних написан страх. На других — свирепая решимость. На третьих — спокойное принятие. Ни один из бойцов сопротивления не оказался трусом, что предпочел бы жизнь среди ксеносов смерти во имя Императора.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One by one, the proud people of the Imperium get on their knees. Some of the faces show fear. Some display grim determination. Some bear expressions of serene acceptance. There are no cowards among the resistance fighters who would prefer life amid xenos over death in the name of the Emperor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

There are no cowards among the resistance fighters — none who would choose life among the xenos to death in the name of the Emperor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帝国の誇り高き人々がひとり、またひとりとひざまずいていく。恐怖に慄く者もいれば、厳しい決意を示す者もいる。受け入れたような穏やかな表情を浮かべる者もいる。抵抗勢力の戦士たちには、皇帝の名において、死よりも異種族の中で生きることを選ぶような臆病者はいない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the proud people of the Imperium drop to their knees. Some of the faces show fear. Some display grim determination. Some bear expressions of serene acceptance. There are no cowards among the resistance fighters — none who would choose life among the xenos to death in the name of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帝国の誇り高き人々がひとり、またひとりとひざまずいていく。恐怖に慄く者もいれば、厳しい決意を示す者もいる。受け入れたような穏やかな表情を浮かべる者もいる。抵抗勢力の戦士たちには、皇帝の名において、死よりも異種族の中で生きることを選ぶような臆病者はいない。{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}自豪的帝国子民一个接一个跪了下来。有的人脸上露出恐惧的表情，有的人表现出了冷酷的决心，还有人表现出了平静的顺从。反抗军的战士没有懦夫，所有人都愿以帝皇的名义而死，没有人愿意屈从于异形的奴役。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the proud people of the Imperium drop to their knees. Some of the faces show fear. Some display grim determination. Some bear expressions of serene acceptance. There are no cowards among the resistance fighters — none who would choose life among the xenos to death in the name of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}自豪的帝国子民一个接一个跪了下来。有的人脸上露出恐惧的表情，有的人表现出了冷酷的决心，还有人表现出了平静的顺从。反抗军的战士没有懦夫，所有人都以帝皇的名义而死，没有人愿意屈从于异形的奴役。{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Uno a uno, los orgullosos habitantes del Imperium se ponen de rodillas. Algunos rostros muestran miedo. Otros muestran una sombría determinación. Los demás muestran expresiones de serena aceptación. No hay cobardes entre la resistencia, formada por quienes eligen vivir entre xenos antes que la muerte en nombre del Emperador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the proud people of the Imperium drop to their knees. Some of the faces show fear. Some display grim determination. Some bear expressions of serene acceptance. There are no cowards among the resistance fighters — none who would choose life among the xenos to death in the name of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno a uno, los orgullosos habitantes del Imperium se ponen de rodillas. Algunos rostros muestran miedo. Otros muestran una sombría determinación. Los demás muestran expresiones de serena aceptación. No hay cobardes entre los resistentes que prefieran la vida xenos a la muerte en nombre del Emperador.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Einer nach dem anderen sinken die stolzen Diener des Imperiums auf die Knie. In einigen Gesichtern erkennst du Angst. In einigen düstere Entschlossenheit. In wieder anderen friedliche Akzeptanz. Es gibt unter diesen Widerstandskämpfern keine Feiglinge ... keiner von ihnen würde ein Leben unter Xenos dem Tod im Namen des Imperators vorziehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the proud people of the Imperium drop to their knees. Some of the faces show fear. Some display grim determination. Some bear expressions of serene acceptance. There are no cowards among the resistance fighters — none who would choose life among the xenos to death in the name of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einer nach dem anderen gehen die stolzen Leute des Imperiums auf die Knie. In einigen der Gesichter siehst du Angst. In einigen düstere Entschlossenheit. In einigen friedliche Akzeptanz. Es gibt unter diesen Widerstandskämpfern keine Feiglinge, die lieber unter Xenos leben als im Namen des Imperators sterben würden.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Un par un, les fiers sujets de l'Imperium tombent à genoux. Sur certains visages, vous lisez de la peur, sur d'autres, une inébranlable détermination, et sur d'autres encore, une résignation empreinte de sérénité, mais il n'y a aucun lâche parmi ces combattants de la résistance, aucun qui ne préférerait vivre parmi les xénos plutôt que de mourir au nom de l'Empereur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the proud people of the Imperium drop to their knees. Some of the faces show fear. Some display grim determination. Some bear expressions of serene acceptance. There are no cowards among the resistance fighters — none who would choose life among the xenos to death in the name of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un par un, les fiers sujets de l'Imperium tombent à genoux. Sur certains visages, vous lisez de la peur, sur d'autres, une inébranlable détermination, et sur d'autres encore, une résignation empreinte de sérénité, mais il n'y a aucun lâche parmi ces combattants de la résistance, qui préfèrent vivre parmi les xénos plutôt que de mourir au nom de l'Empereur.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}İmparatorluk'un gururlu kulları, birer birer diz çöküyor. Bazılarının yüzünden korku okunurken bazıları, kararlılıklarını bozmuyor. Bazılarının yüzündeyse huzurlu bir kabulleniş görülüyor. Direniş savaşçıları arasında korkak kimse yok... Zenolar arasında yaşamaktansa İmparator adına ölmeyi yeğliyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the proud people of the Imperium drop to their knees. Some of the faces show fear. Some display grim determination. Some bear expressions of serene acceptance. There are no cowards among the resistance fighters — none who would choose life among the xenos to death in the name of the Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İmparatorluk'un gururlu kulları birer birer diz çöküyor. Bazılarının yüzünden korku okunurken, bazıları vakur bir şekilde kararlı. Bazılarının yüzündeyse huzurlu bir kabulleniş görülüyor. Direnişin savaşçıları arasında korkak kimse yok... Her biri, zenolar arasında yaşamaktansa İmparator adına ölmeyi yeğliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison
